title: Discount
description: This is an offer from the supplier to the purchaser, to reduce the payment amount if the payment is made within a certain period of time.

schema:description.title: Description
schema:description.description: Describes the discounting rules in detail.

xdm:code.title: Code
xdm:code.description: The description of the `discountValue` attribute. e.g percentage, currency, 3for2 etc. Can be enumerated, custom values allowed.

meta:enum.bogoho: Buy one, get one half off
meta:enum.3for2: Three for the price of two
meta:enum.3fixed: Any three items for a fixed price
meta:enum.voucher: Save `xdm:value` when you spend more than `xdm:condition`

xdm:value.title: Value
xdm:value.description: If the discount description indicates a percentage or similar formulaic value, it is represented here, can be percentage or currency amount.

xdm:condition.title: Condition
xdm:condition.description: The minimum amount of items or price for the discount to qualify.
